assigned_issues.description: The following issue was detected with a svelte widget that causes memory leaks with high latency. Set up additional logging and monitoring for better observability during runtime. Your immediate attention to this matter is required.

assigned_issues.description: Here we have a server instance that fails in staging environments on mobile devices. Improve test coverage to ensure similar problems are caught early in the development cycle. Please prioritize its resolution as soon as possible.
